_comment_type: Options: 'binary' (searches in system PATH using 'which') or 'script' (assumes it lives in '$scripts_dir/'). Defaults to 'binary' if omitted.
_comment_install: Installation command added to 'install.sh'. For pipx tools, the script converts- 'pipx install ...' to 'pipx_install_or_upgrade ...' automatically. Use double quotes for URLs: 'wget "https://..." -O ...'
_comment_auth_mapping: Maps internal linWinPwn variables to tool flags. Placeholders like {user}, {password}, {domain}, {hash}, {key}, {cert} are replaced with shell variables like ${user}, ${password}, etc. If a method is MISSING from this mapping, the generated wrapper will BLOCK that authentication method with a warning.
_comment_wrapper_function: 'name' is the name of the bash function that will be created in linWinPwn.sh.
_comment_menu_info: 'parent_menu' identifies the menu function in linWinPwn.sh to add the tool to. Valid options: 'ad_menu', 'adcs_menu', 'sccm_menu', 'gpo_menu', 'bruteforce_menu', 'kerberos_menu', 'shares_menu', 'vulns_menu', 'mssql_menu', 'pwd_menu', 'modif_menu', 'cmdexec_menu', 'netscan_menu'.
